headers.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

responses.text:
flask.debughelpers.FormDataRoutingRedirect

flask.debughelpers.FormDataRoutingRedirect: b'A request was sent to this URL (http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/users) but a redirect was issued automatically by the routing system to "http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/users/". The URL was defined with a trailing slash so Flask will automatically redirect to the URL with the trailing slash if it was accessed without one. Make sure to directly send your POST-request to this URL since we can\'t make browsers or HTTP clients redirect with form data reliably or without user interaction.\n\nNote: this exception is only raised in debug mode'
